title: M. Control, Email and Opt-Out
sections: You have control over your Customer Information and other personal information related to your use of the Network. Accordingly, you may access, review, add, rectify, modify, correct, delete or update your Customer Information or other personal information at any time.

If you no longer wish to receive marketing communications from us, you can easily opt out by following the instructions in our emails or by managing your preferences in your account. We respect your choices and will honor your request to stop receiving promotional messages.
